choices.A: to provide automation for device deployment
choices.C: to automate the provisioning of VLANs
choices.D: to provide integration between devices in a heterogeneous network

questions.question_text: Which two options are goals of virtualization in the data center? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
CD is correct. Straight from the Cisco course:

There are benefits to credit-based flow control:
Prevents loss of Fibre Channel frame due to buffer overruns
Maximizes performance under high loads

questions.question_text: Which two options are benefits of credit-based flow control in a Fibre Channel network? (Choose two.)

choices.A: sends credit to all of the switches in a SAN zone
choices.E: provides automatic buffer scaling under high loads
choices.D: prevents the loss of frames due to buffer overruns
choices.B: increases the credit limit when the buffer overruns

discussion.content: MEC = MultiChassis EtherChanel. Works on VSS.

questions.question_text: Which two technologies can overcome the link blocking feature that STP implements to ensure a loop-free topology? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Correct answer: DE
Dynamic ARP inspection determines the validity of an ARP packet based on valid IP-to-MAC address bindings stored in a trusted database, the DHCP snooping binding database. This database is built by DHCP snooping if DHCP snooping is enabled on the VLANs and on the switch.
In non-DHCP environments, dynamic ARP inspection can validate ARP packets against user-configured ARP access control lists (ACLs) for hosts with statically configured IP addresses.
https://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/switches/lan/catalyst3850/software/release/3se/consolidated_guide/b_consolidated_3850_3se_cg_chapter_0111101.html
Access list applies not on the "each switch port" but on VLAN.

choices.C: access control lists configured on each switch port

questions.question_text: You use Dynamic ARP Inspection on data center switches Which two options can the switches use to perform ARP validation? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: OTV is designed for multi DC. vPC is designed to channel the 2 kabels.
